data.title: Role of Parents and Teachers in the Social Development of Students
data.text:
Babies, Earl R. The Practice of Social Research, 2nd edition, Wads Worth Publishing Company, 1979.

Brown, D., Wyne, M.D. Black burn, J. E. and Powell, W. C. (1979). Consultation: a strategy for improving education. Boston: Allyn and Bacon pg: 111-112.

Carter, E. A., & McGoldrick, M. (1980). The Family Life Cycle: A Framework for Family Therapy. Psychology Press.

Conoley, J.C., and Conoley C.W.,( 1982). School consultation: A guide to practice and training. Pergamon Press, Elmsford, New York.

Dr Prem Victor, Professor Armin Loewe, (1985). 2nd All India Workshop for teachers and parents for children, India: Max Mueller Bhavan, New Delhi: pg126.

Ehly, S. W, and Larson, S.C.,(1980). Peer tutoring for individualized instruction, Boston: Allyn and Bacon pg:209.

Ehly, S. W, Conoley. J.C, Rosenthal. D, (1985). working with Parents of Exceptional Children, st. Low" s: Times Mirror/ Mosby College Publishing: pg 129–133.

Featherstone. H (1980). A difference in the family. New York, Basic Books; pg 3–5.

Foster, M., Berger, M., and McLean, M., (1981). Rethinking a good idea: A reassessment of parent involvement. Topics in Early Childhood. Special Education, pg 89.

Han, Raj. (1987). Theory and Practice in Social Research, Delhi: Surjeet Publication.

Heinich, R., Molenda, M., Russell, J. D., & Smaldino, S. E. (1999). Instructional- media and technologies for learning (6th ed.). Upper Saddle River, NJ: Merrill/Prentice Hall, Inc

Horton and Hunt. (1984). Sociology, 6th edition, McGraw Hill, pg: 97.

Jonassen, D. H. (1996). Computers as mind tools for schools: Engaging critical thinking (2nd Ed.). Upper Saddle River, NJ: Merrill/Prentice Hall, Inc.

Kober, N. (1991). What we know about mathematics teaching and learning. Washington, D.C.: Council for Educational Development and Research.

Lillic, D.L. (1981). Educational and psychological strategies for working with parents of children with special needs, New York; pg6.

Meadow, K.P. (1980). Deafness and Child Development. California: University of California: pg 112.

Sarantakos, Sotiriom, Social Research Australia: MacMillan, 1993.

Simpson, R. L & Poplin, M. (1981). Parents as agents of change: A behavioural approach. School psychology review, pg 199-200

The Lancet. (2009). Volume 373, Issue9666, pg 781.
